metadata.topic_title: Remote Work and Distributed Operations Capabilities

active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate the statement: 'The shift to remote and hybrid work has made Zero Trust Architecture not just beneficial, but essential for business continuity in cybersecurity.' Support your position with examples of risks like expanded attack surfaces or insider threats, and propose countermeasures grounded in endpoint security and anti-phishing training.
